channel.title: Community_docs on E-Heza Documentation
channel.description: Recent content in Community_docs on E-Heza Documentation

item.title: Contributing to E-Heza
item.description: Contributing Code E-Heza is an open source project and welcomes contributions from the developer community. The E-Heza project uses PHP, Javascript, Drupal CMS, Elm frontend language, among other frameworks and languages. If you are able to make a code contribution, There are other ways to contribute below. If you are interested in making a code contribution and would like to learn more about the technologies that we use, see the developer documentation in the project repository.

item.title: E-Heza Project Road Map
item.description: The E-Heza Road Map is maintained by the E-Heza Executive Committee. Features requests can be made through the documented feature request process. Feature Description Release Date Release Status Notes Group Nutrition Assessment (Health Center) Provides nutrition screening for groups of mother/child pairs participating in PMTCT groups. June 2018 0.1.0 complete - Nutrition Activitiy includes measurements for height, weight, MUAC, photo of child, family planning
